{"id":1197251983,"question_id":3242,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1709869497,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1197251983/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Elements With Maximum Frequency","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxFrequencyElements(vector<int>& vc) {\n        int Max = 0;\n        map<int,int>mp;\n        for(auto it : vc){\n            mp[vc[it]]++;\n            Max = max(Max, mp[vc[it]]);\n        }\n        int cnt = 0;\n        for(auto it : vc){\n            if(mp[vc[it]]==Max)\n            {\n                cnt += Max;\n                mp[vc[it]] = 0;\n            }\n        }\n        return cnt;\n\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-elements-with-maximum-frequency","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
